entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse YOU SHOULD APOLOGIZE to the thousands of relatives who lost their DADS to COVID-19 because 
of your Criminal response to the pandemic.

COVID-19 IS NOT MIRACULOUSLY GOING AWAY
TRUMP ABANDONED AMERICANS

TRUMP FAILED TO FEDERALIZE NATIONWIDE TESTING
AND NATIONWIDE PPE
